keyToStrMap.0: Her name is Pauline and she delivers the mail.
keyToStrMap.1: She says the mail delivery team are snowed under with packages today.
keyToStrMap.2: Because the packages are made of unstable matter, they need to be delivered quickly. Any dilly-dallying and they might disappear.
keyToStrMap.3: Recently, monkeys have been been causing trouble in the neighbourhood. Now the locals are afraid to open their doors. They only open the door if you knock a certain number of times. But you can figure out the number of knocks from the word on their door.
keyToStrMap.4: Pauline wants to know if I can help the mail delivery team. She says to watch out for the monkeys because they have a thing for stealing packages

keyToStrMap.Full:
Pauline the Postie

Occupation:
[] Postie (previously tennis player)

Likes:
[] Playing tennis, watching fireworks

Dislikes:
[] Peanut butter and blue cheese ice cream

Favourite quote:
[] We must use time as a tool, not as a couch.

Favourite people in the (living) world:
[] My cat Marlene

How I came to be here:
[] A terrible tennis accident

What I wish:
[] That Marlene lived here.
